articles.author: Anna Kaplan
articles.title: Katharine McPhee Will Miss David Foster's Shows After 'Horrible' Family Tragedy - TODAY
articles.description: Katharine McPhee Foster announced she has to skip her husband David Foster's last two remaining tour dates in Asia due to a "horrible" family tragedy.
articles.content:
Katharine McPhee Foster is skipping her husband David Foster's last two remaining tour dates in Asia after a "horrible tragedy" occurred in their family.

articles.title: Shakib returns as Bangladesh ODI captain for Asia Cup and World Cup - ESPNcricinfo
articles.description: He last led Bangladesh in an ODI in 2017, and is now their captain in all three formats
articles.content: Tamim out of Asia Cup with back injury, steps down as ODI captain
